steps-informal.p: You can save a file in the following ways:

ul.li: Click on the saveicon on the main tool bar

Choose the appropriate Save menu option from the File drop down menu in the menu bar
Save: saves the file with a new name or the changes made to an already existing and open file
Save As: saves the document under a new name, and the new file remains open for editing
Save A Copy As: saves the document under a new name, but the original, not the new one remains open for editing
Save: saves all the open files at once
Choose the destination where you wish to save the file
Enter the file name, choose the file type and click on the Save button
